text: Rowdy & MLA is a 1991 Indian Kannada crime-action film directed by Om Sai Prakash who also wrote a fresh screenplay for the original story by P. Vasu.Om Saiprakash profile The film is a remake of the Tamil film Velai Kidaichuduchu (1990), which was directed by P. Vasu. The film features Ambarish and Malashri in the lead roles.Rowdy & MLA (ರೌಡಿ ‍& ಎಂ.ಎಲ್.ಎ) 10 September 1991- Drama, Political The film was received well and declared a superhit at the box office. The film's music was composed by Hamsalekha and the audio was launched on the Lahari Music banner. == Cast == *Ambarish *Malashri *Jaggesh *Srinath *Jai Jagadish *Mukhyamantri Chandru *Sihi Kahi Chandru *Rambo Rocky *Bank Janardhan *Mohanapriya *Annapoorna == Soundtrack == The music of the film was composed and lyrics written by Hamsalekha. == References == Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Kannada-language films Category:Politics in fiction Category:Indian crime action films Category:Films scored by Hamsalekha Category:Kannada remakes of Tamil films Category:1990s crime action films Category:Political action films Category:Films directed by Sai Prakash
title: Rowdy & MLA
